title: Directs the division for small business to maintain a small business portal on the department of economic development's website
summary: Directs the division for small business to maintain a small business portal on the department of economic development's internet website; provides such portal shall be a one-stop source of information to existing and prospective small businesses.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to directing the division for small business to maintain a small business portal on the department of economic development internet website
